idea-plugin.name: Arc Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Arc light look alike visual theme for Intellij IDEA. Default accented color is blue or orange.

For version 2019.3 and above.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
2.0
  • Arc dark version is now separated into own plugins (Arc Theme Dark and Arc Theme Darker).
1.8
  • Added first version of Arc Dark theme.
  • Unified hover effect to lighter in the light theme (not possible everywhere).
  • Unified styling of tabs.
  • Added own editor theme for light and dark themes.
1.7
  • Use panel background also for main Toolbar.
1.6
  • Revert to default row height in Tree, too small row height was temporary bug in Idea.
1.5
  • Fixed invisible menu separators for light themes.
  • Fixed ScrollBar default background.
  • Fixed Notification more button background.
1.4
  • Use arc-theme light with blue accent as the default after plugin installation.
  • Use white background as default fixes issues with some input boxes using panel background.
  • Use same style for DefaultTabs as EditorTabs and TabbedPane.
  • Fixed row height in Tree to match Intellij IDEA 2019.2 version.
  • Use panel color for ToolTip color.
  • Fixed CompletionPopup matched and selected color overlap.
  • Unified toolbar separator color to darker.
1.3
  • Use white background in plugins UI
  • Use accented color for install/update buttons in plugins UI.
  • Use same height of plugins UI tabs underline.
  • Fixed visibility of counter (eg. number of plugin updates).
1.2
  • Update for IntelliJ 2019.2
  • Use accented color for tabs underline
  • Added Arc Darker theme with dark menus (its not quite right yet)
1.1
  • Set compatibility to all IntelliJ IDEs
  • Changed plugin id
1.0
  • Initial release of Arc look alike theme. This is a light version with default blue and optional orange accented color.
